Package com.optiply.infrastructure.data.repositories

Class WebshopemailsRepository

java.lang.Object
com.optiply.infrastructure.data.repositories.WebshopemailsRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWebshopemailsRepository
@Singleton public class WebshopemailsRepository extends Object implements IWebshopemailsRepository
The Webshopemails table Repository. Used to access the Webshopemails table with JOOQ type safe operations via the R2DBC driver in a reactive fashion.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final org.jooq.DSLContext
    dslContext
    The DSL context, used to generate SQL queries or get its dialect and other properties.
    private final io.micronaut.data.r2dbc.operations.R2dbcOperations
    operations
    The R2DBC driver, used to execute SQL queries in a reactive fashion, needs DSLContext properties.
